name: Clean Sweep (branung)
description:
Play as a little robot inside of a computer as they dodge bugs and access terminals to clean the place up.

This was one part of a school project where we made a website that hosted several games, each of which had online leaderboard functionality. However, due to the hosting server going down, the leaderboard's been taken out of this version. 

I made this game on my own, and since we were spread thin with how much were tackling, it's pretty short, but hopefully somewhat enjoyable.
